description:
Eight years of building production systems with Apache Kafka taught us that Kafka can be brilliant, but can also be really hard to use.


Kpow Community Edition is the result of that experience - a free, enterprise-grade, fully-featured toolkit for monitoring and controlling Apache Kafka.


In this hands-on session dive into:


1. How to quickly get Kpow CE up and running with a Kafka Cluster, Schema Registry, and Kafka Connect.

2. Finding the needle-in-a-haystack message with blazing-fast multi-topic search and built in JQ predicates.

3. Skipping poison-pills and re-computing data with consumer offset management.

4. How to diagnose the root cause of production lag issues with multi-dimensional consumer metrics.

5. Blending Clojure and JQ to make quick assertions about data on topics with the kREPL.


Bring a laptop with Docker installed to play along!
title: Tune-Up Your Kafka Tooling with Kpow
